Title: Wanted: Everblazing Fireheart
Description:
<The posted sign is written in beautiful calligraphy.>

The archivists humbly request that all expedition members seek out the Everblazing Fireheart for our artifact archives.

If acquired, please deliver to Cataloger Jakes for processing and compensation.

Some expedition members have reported seeing a massive fire elemental under control of the Primalists in the north that may provide an opportunity to acquire one.
PortraitGiverText: The primalists in the Life-Binder Conservatory have unleashed a powerful fire elemental!
ObjectivesCompletionText: Return to Cataloger Jakes in the Dragonscale Basecamp.
